_comment: INVALID test file for API error validation
_purpose: This file intentionally contains incorrect data to test the error-handling behavior of the breast cancer prediction API. It is used to verify that the API correctly validates input data types and returns appropriate error messages when non-numeric values are found.
_error_type: Invalid data type inside the feature array

_specific_error.description: The 'features' array contains a string value instead of a numeric value

_expected_response.message: Error related to invalid data type: cannot convert string to float

_comparison_with_valid.difference: Contains a string at position 23 where a numeric value is expected

_model_impact: The scikit-learn model requires all features to be numeric (float or int). When attempting to convert the array to a NumPy array or during preprocessing, a ValueError or TypeError will occur because mathematical operations cannot be performed on strings.
_technical_note: This file demonstrates the importance of input validation in Machine Learning APIs. Without proper validation, errors like this could cause unhandled exceptions in the server.

_related_test_cases.test_2: Features provided as a string instead of a list
_related_test_cases.test_3: This file - non-numeric values inside the feature list
_related_test_cases.test_4: Features with an incorrect number of values
